Description: Ostracon, fragment of the rim and wall of a red pottery bowl with convex sides and everted rim, the fabric is grey in section, the exterior is covered with a red slip and remains of one line of incised Coptic text, the interior is thickly encrusted with a dark-brown resinous deposit.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394241) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394241)
